headline: Denarius Metals Announces Details for the October 31, 2025 Interest Payments on Its Convertible Unsecured Debentures
summary: Toronto, Ontario--(Newsfile Corp. - October 29, 2025) - Denarius Metals Corp. (Cboe CA: DMET) (OTCQX: DNRSF) ("Denarius Metals" or the "Company") announced today the details for the forthcoming monthly interest payments due on October 31, 2025 on its convertible unsecured debentures due October 19, 2029 (the "2023 Debentures") and May 30, 2030 (the "2024 Debentures").The table below summarizes the details for the shares to be issued to holders of the 2023 Debentures and 2024 Debentures on...

headline: Zacks.com featured highlights include NatWest, CBOE Global, Alcoa, Safran and Casey's
summary: As markets hit record highs, Zacks spotlights five low-leverage stocks, NatWest, CBOE Global, Alcoa, Safran, and Casey's as safer bets for steady returns.
